events.message: I recently received my order but decided I want to return it and get a full refund because the product doesn't meet my expectations.
System identified the issue as Refund based on customer's request for returning the product and getting money back.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Sarah T. for handling the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process the refund quickly, I need you to confirm the order number and the reason for the return.
The order number is 12345XYZ. I would like a refund because the product was not as described on the website.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process. Please return the product using the provided shipping label, and once received, the refund will be issued within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the help and will send back the product today using the label.
We have received the returned product and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account shortly.
Just checking in to make sure you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been successfully completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us!
